alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 22 at 2:59PM CDT until March 22 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Saline County in central Missouri... Southeastern Lafayette County in west central Missouri... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 258 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Concordia, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Concordia, Alma, Blackburn and Emma. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 56 and 63. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
